agent_utterance: You’ve got this. Ultra-small, doable steps for now: 1) drink one glass of water (about 250 ml). 2) try a 2-minute, gentle breathing exercise (inhale 4 seconds, exhale 6 seconds). 3) rate your hunger on a 0–5 scale. If your hunger is 2 or higher and you feel ready, have a tiny, comforting snack (like a small yogurt, a few crackers, or fruit) in a way that feels manageable. If not hungry, pause for 10 minutes and re-check. You can choose to use optional prompts or skip them today.
